modelCorrections.rawOutput:
- Thought: To make the HTML accessible according to WCAG 2.1 guidelines, I need to add the "lang" attribute to the <html> tag to specify the language of the content. This helps screen readers and other assistive technologies provide the correct language context to users.

- Corrected HTML: <html lang="en"><head></head><body></body></html>
